required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Drug-drug Interaction Study of Gefitinb on Apatinib in NSCLC Patients
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-center, Open-label, Fixed-sequence Study of Effect of Gefitinib on the Pharmacokinetics of Apatinib Mesylate in Non-squamous, Non-small-cell Lung Cancer Patients

brief_summary.textblock:
The primary objective of the study was to assess the effect of gefitinib on the pharmacokinetics of apatinib mesylate in lung cancer patients.
The secondary objective of the study was to assess the pharmacokinetics of gefitinib, and to assess the safety of apatinib mesylate and gefitinib administered in lung cancer patients.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: All the subjects will administrated with apatinib and gefitinib following the same sequence to assess the effect of gefitinib on the pharmacokinetics of apatinib in NSCLC patients

primary_outcome.description: Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration for apatinib
Area Under the Concentration-time Curve From Zero (Pre-dose) to 24 hours

arm_group.description: Subjects will be administrated with 500mg apatinib on day 1 and day 12-15, and administrated with gefitinib on day 4-15.

intervention.description: Subjects will be administrated with 500mg apatinib on day 1 and day 12-15, and administrated with gefitinib on day 4-15.
